title: Command_block question  大触来
author: 阴阳师元素祭祀
txt_content:
版本1.9.2
召唤一个僵尸 可以更改血量 名字 防具 武器 探测玩家距离  以及加入一个队伍 (score啥的teams的队)

格式+示例指令(皮革头盔 队伍随便 生命40 玩家距离高好点 武器无 掉率全部0 )

1.9.2可用1.9.2可用1.9.2可用

先自己测试 可行在回复 我也会单人测试

金粒这么少是因为没钱了= =
@FHC红石

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content:
阴阳师元素祭祀 发表于 2016-5-16 11:46
我的意思是我钻石剑 我身上没力量 3下打死 

我不要僵尸有力量 另外刚才空手打了23下就死了 原先指令
拿掉力量了
/summon Zombie ~ ~1 ~ {CustomName:"我是自定义名字",CustomNameVisible:1,Glowing:1,Attributes:[{Name:"generic.maxHealth",Base:80},{Name:"generic.followRange",Base:500},{Name:"generic.movementSpeed",Base:3f},{Name:"generic.attackDamage",Base:5},{Name:"zombie.spawnReinforcements",Base:0.33f}],ArmorItems:[{},{},{},{id:"minecraft:leather_helmet",tag:{display:{color:1875981,Name:"绿帽子",Lore:["不拉了"]},ench:[{id:0,lvl:4}]}}],Team:blue}复制代码

replies.author: 阴阳师元素祭祀
replies.txt_content:
lichi2050 发表于 2016-5-16 18:38
没有更改血量 游戏我用钻石剑3下就打死了 没力量

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content: scoreboard teams add blue 蓝队复制代码/summon Zombie ~ ~1 ~ {CustomName:"我是自定义名字",CustomNameVisible:1,CanPickUpLoot:1b,Attributes:[{Name:"generic.maxHealth",Base:80},{Name:"generic.followRange",Base:500}],ArmorItems:[{},{},{},{id:"minecraft:leather_helmet",tag:{display:{color:4759606,Name:"我是绿帽子",Lore:["啦啦啦"]}}}],Team:blue}复制代码

replies.author: lzs1234
replies.txt_content: 标签中加上Health:血量（不知道要不完像HealF一样加后缀？@chyx ）

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
阴阳师元素祭祀 发表于 2016-5-16 20:01
如果没有办法改的话我就给你最佳了= =
↓ 你有办法么
@FHC红石
1.9生命属性：
/summon Zombie ~ ~1 ~
{Attributes:[{Name:generic.maxHealth,Base:1000,Health:1000.0f}]
Health:生成血量
